name: Blastroom
description:
I've been playing around with the Pico 8 for a while, and I thought I'd sit down and try to create a full game myself! I coded this in about 4 days. It's an arcade-like experience, loosely inspired by Disc Room and Pigments, but it takes that general game structure in a new direction. There's twelve different levels to try to survive in, each with their own obstacles, powers, and goals.

Controls should be explained in-game. Have fun playing, and good luck earning the highest medals!

Thank you to Heracleum and the PICO-8 Discord with help optimizing the game's draw loop.

https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=51439
